verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a reed <S%G2563><s%> like unto <S%G3664><s%> a rod: <S%G4464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> stood, <S%G2476><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rise, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> altar, <S%G2379><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that worship <S%G4352><s%> therein. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> court <S%G833><s%> which is without <S%G1855><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> leave <S%G1544><s%> out, <S%G1854><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> it <S%G846><s%> not; <S%G3361><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it is given <S%G1325><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles: <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> shall they tread under foot <S%G3961><s%> forty and two <S%G5062><s%> <S%G1417><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> power unto my <S%G3450><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they shall prophesy <S%G4395><s%> a thousand two hundred and threescore <S%G5507><s%> <S%G1250><s%> <S%G1835><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in sackcloth. <S%G4526><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> olive trees, <S%G1636><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if any man <S%G1536><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> proceedeth <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G848><s%> mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoureth <S%G2719><s%> their <S%G848><s%> enemies: <S%G2190><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> if any man <S%G1536><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> in this manner <S%G3779><s%> be killed. <S%G615><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to shut <S%G2808><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it rain not <S%G1026><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5205><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of their <S%G848><s%> prophecy: <S%G4394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%> to turn <S%G4762><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to smite <S%G3960><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> as often as <S%G3740><s%> they will. <S%G2309><s%> <S%G1437><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they shall have finished <S%G5055><s%> their <S%G848><s%> testimony, <S%G3141><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> that ascendeth <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bottomless pit <S%G12><s%> shall make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall overcome <S%G3528><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G848><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> shall lie in <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> street <S%G4113><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> spiritually <S%G4153><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> was crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kindreds <S%G5443><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> shall see <S%G991><s%> their <S%G848><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a half, <S%G2255><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> suffer <S%G863><s%> their <S%G848><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> to be put <S%G5087><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> graves. <S%G3418><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they that dwell <S%G2730><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall rejoice <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make merry, <S%G2165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall send <S%G3992><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> one to another; <S%G240><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> tormented <S%G928><s%> them that dwelt <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a half <S%G2255><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they stood <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> feet; <S%G4228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them which saw <S%G2334><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Come up <S%G305><s%> hither. <S%G5602><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> they ascended up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a cloud; <S%G3507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G848><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> beheld <S%G2334><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> there a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tenth part <S%G1182><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> fell, <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%> were slain <S%G615><s%> of <S%G3686><s%> men <S%G444><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thousand: <S%G5505><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> remnant <S%G3062><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> affrighted, <S%G1719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is past; <S%G565><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> quickly. <S%G5035><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded; <S%G4537><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there were <S%G1096><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of this world <S%G2889><s%> are become <S%G1096><s%> the kingdoms of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall reign <S%G936><s%> forever and ever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> four and twenty <S%G5064><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1501><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> which sat <S%G2521><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> seats, <S%G2362><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> faces, <S%G4383><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> We give thee thanks, <S%G2168><s%> <S%G4671><s%> O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> which art, and wast, and art to come; <S%G3801><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast taken <S%G2983><s%> to thee thy <S%G4675><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast reigned. <S%G936><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> were angry, <S%G3710><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> that they should be judged, <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that thou shouldest give <S%G1325><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> unto thy <S%G4675><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that fear <S%G5399><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great; <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shouldest destroy <S%G1311><s%> them which destroy <S%G1311><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was seen <S%G3700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ark <S%G2787><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> testament: <S%G1242><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there were <S%G1096><s%> lightnings, <S%G796><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> voices, <S%G5456><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thunderings, <S%G1027><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> hail. <S%G5464><s%>
